description: Same rule as Aitken triangle (A011971) except a(0,0)=1, a(1,0)=0.
comments: First differences of A046935 = this triangle seen as flattened list without the initial term. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..125 of triangle, flattened
prog: (Haskell)a046934 n k = a046934_tabl !! n !! ka046934_row n = a046934_tabl !! na046934_tabl = [1] : iterate (\row -> scanl (+) (last row) row) [0,1]a046934_list = concat a046934_tabl-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
crossrefs: Borders give A032347 and A032346. Cf. A046935.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
